sentences.en: "We're meant to do it quarterly actually."— 'Oh quarterly. I beg your pardon. I thought it was monthly.'
sentences.cn: “其实我们本意是一季度一次。”——“哦，一季度一次，对不起，我还以为一月一次呢。”

sentences.en: A full listing of the companies will be published quarterly.
sentences.cn: 公司名录大全每季度出版一次。

sentences.en: a quarterly meeting of the board
A small sum of money is supposed to be forked out quarterly for burglary and robbery insurance.
sentences.cn: 每季度要交一小笔防盗防抢保险金.

sentences.en: Clients normally pay fees in advance, monthly, quarterly, or yearly.
sentences.cn: 客户通常按月、季度或年度预付费用。

sentences.en: It makes no difference whether dividends are paid quarterly or annually.
sentences.cn: 红利是按季度还是按年度支付没有区别。

sentences.en: It was a quarterly newslet - ter.
Look, this is our company's quarterly bulletin.
sentences.cn: 看, 这就是我们公司出版的季刊.
我们的俱乐部每季度开一次会.

sentences.en: She has edited the media studies quarterly, Screen.
sentences.cn: 她编选了这本媒体研究季刊——《银幕》。
委员会每季度开一次会.

sentences.en: The organization now has around 18,000 members who receive a quarterly newsletter.
sentences.cn: 该组织现有大约18,000名成员，他们会收到一份内部通讯季刊。

sentences.en: The quarterly magazine is a periodical published every three months.
sentences.cn: 季刊是每3个月出版一次的期刊.

sentences.en: Their quarterly meetings were anodyne affairs.
sentences.cn: 他们的季度会议乏善可陈。

sentences.en: They keep in touch with their members by issuing a quarterly newsletter.
sentences.cn: 他们印发内部季刊与会员保持联系.

words.tran_cn: 四分之一；地区；季度；一刻钟；两角五分；节；vi. 住宿；驻扎；vt. 将…四等分；供某人住宿；num. 四分之一
四分之一品脱；四等分，四分之一
（以四分卫）指挥进攻；领导；操纵

trans.tran_cn: 季度的，按季度的，四分之一
trans.tran_en: produced or happening four times a year
produced or happening four times a year

trans.tran_cn: 按季度，[农] 一季一次地；纵横四分地

trans.tran_en: a magazine that is produced four times a year
